thread.title: Edward & Elizabeth
thread.title_full: R&G Brenner Income Tax reviewed by Edward & Elizabeth

author: Edward & Elizabeth
title: Edward & Elizabeth
text:
Barbara and her staff are always there to help, even past tax season. I've been using Barbara since 2003 and she helps my wife all year round. I needed tax documents in July and she gets them to me in minutes.
Besides that she always gives me a HUGE tax return.
R&G Brenner+Barbara=Money in the Bank
